column5: anyone need anything??? i'll take just a small commission  just kidding.Looking forward to seeing the accessories and the like for my new ride.
Is it still at the big "O"? I remeber the TV ads from when I was a kid.
When are they going to demolish the big O then? The only thing happening there must be a max of 5 Als games a year. They could probably demolish it for what it costs in upkeep a year.
